main event: A UFO sighting reported on 8 January 1955, near Tyndall AFB, featuring a bright round light observed for 3-4 seconds.
interesting points: The object was described as a round, very bright light., The observation lasted for a brief period of 3-4 seconds., There were multiple conclusions drawn, including that it was probably a meteor or balloon., Observations were made by military personnel stationed at Tyndall AFB., Similar sightings were reported by local civilians in the area.
location: 20 Mi N of Tyndall AFB, Florida, USA
witness description: Lt. 09/02502 and A/2C Douglas R. Kilgore from the air police
